stolen cards to add to your draw pile.
stolen cards to add to your discard pile.

theThief:DaggerBouquet.NAME: Dagger Bouquet
theThief:DaggerBouquet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theThief:Lie.NAME: Lie
theThief:Lie.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies.

theThief:SharpPractice.NAME: Sharp Practice
theThief:SharpPractice.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! random stolen card to your hand.
theThief:SharpPractice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn add !M! random stolen card to your hand.

theThief:Ransack.NAME: Ransack
theThief:Ransack.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 out of 3 stolen cards and add !M! copies of it to your hand.

theThief:IllGottenGains.NAME: Ill Gotten Gains
theThief:IllGottenGains.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of this combat, all stolen cards you gain are upgraded.
theThief:IllGottenGains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For the rest of this combat, all stolen cards you gain are upgraded.

theThief:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A better defend
theThief:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.
theThief:DefaultUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theThief:SimilarSkills.NAME: Similar Skills
theThief:SimilarSkills.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Green card to your deck. It costs 0 this combat.
theThief:SimilarSkills.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Upgraded Green card to your deck. It costs 0 this combat.

theThief:DramaticFeign.NAME: Dramatic Feign
theThief:DramaticFeign.DESCRIPTION: Stun and apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL You cannot play cards for the rest of this turn. NL The first card you play next turn is refunded.

theThief:StolenMomentum.NAME: Stolen Momentum
theThief:StolenMomentum.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then choose 1 card to discard. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenArtifice.NAME: Stolen Artifice
theThief:StolenArtifice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy next turn. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenArtifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy next turn. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenAdvantage.NAME: Stolen Advantage
theThief:StolenAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards next turn. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenAdvantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenRitual.NAME: Stolen Ritual
theThief:StolenRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 hp, gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 hp, gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenTechnique.NAME: Stolen Technique
theThief:StolenTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your hand from any color. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your hand from any color. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenChange.NAME: Stolen Change
theThief:StolenChange.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn is refunded. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn is refunded. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenTrap.NAME: Stolen Trap
theThief:StolenTrap.DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.
theThief:StolenTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.

theThief:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theThief:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !BkStMgc! instead NL Ethereal.
theThief:ShadowForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !BkStMgc! instead.

theThief:Stab.NAME: Stab
theThief:Stab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Backstab: Deal !BkStDmg! instead.

theThief:CloakAndDaggerThief.NAME: Cloak and Dagger
theThief:CloakAndDaggerThief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Backstab: Deal !D! Damage instead.

theThief:SwiftTread.NAME: Swift Tread
theThief:SwiftTread.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Shuffle 1 Void into your draw pile.

theThief:BeautifulLies.NAME: Beautiful Lies
theThief:BeautifulLies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a copy of this card to your deck. NL Exhaust. NL Soulbound.
theThief:BeautifulLies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a copy of this card to your deck. NL Exhaust. NL Soulbound.

theThief:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
theThief:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has any debuff, gain 1 [R] and draw !M! cards next turn.
theThief:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has any debuff, gain 1 [R] and draw !M! cards next turn.

theThief:Follow-up.NAME: Follow-up
theThief:Follow-up.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy, next turn, to all enemies.
theThief:Follow-up.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy, next turn, to all enemies.

theThief:OneStepAhead.NAME: One Step Ahead
theThief:OneStepAhead.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, Shadowstep !M! time. If it intends to block, deal !D! damage !BkStMgc! times instead.
theThief:OneStepAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, Shadowstep !M! times. If it intends to block, deal !D! damage !BkStMgc! times instead.

theThief:CripplingStrike.NAME: Crippling Strike
theThief:CripplingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak. Backstab: Apply !M! Vulnerable instead.

theThief:StickyFingers.NAME: Sticky Fingers
theThief:StickyFingers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Backstab: Steal !BkStMgc! card instead.
theThief:StickyFingers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Backstab: Steal !BkStMgc! cards instead.
